basic.description: Advanced study of gender relations from postcolonial and anti-racist theoretical perspectives. Historical and sociological analysis of femininity, masculinity, race and sexuality, particularly in the context of nation-building and colonialism.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Advanced Studies in Gender Relations

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    Lvl 4 and reg in a SOCY Major or Medial Plan and  SOCY331 and (a min of C in SOCY210 and 211 and 226 and 227) and (a min GPA of 2.6 in SOCY210 and 211 and 226 and 227) and (a min GPA of 2.6 in all SOCY).
